questions.question: What plot combines box plot with kernel density visualization?
questions.explanation: Violin plots show distribution shape alongside quartile information.

questions.question: What chart displays hierarchical data as nested rectangles?
questions.explanation: Treemaps use sized rectangles to show proportions in hierarchies.

questions.question: What library creates server-side interactive Python visualizations?
questions.explanation: Bokeh generates interactive plots for modern web browsers.

questions.question: What plot shows multiple dimensions on axes from a center point?
questions.explanation: Radar charts display multivariate data on radial axes.

questions.question: What visualization shows overlapping distributions along a single axis?
questions.explanation: Ridge plots display multiple distributions stacked vertically.

questions.question: What chart adds a third dimension to scatter plots using bubble size?
questions.explanation: Bubble charts encode a third variable as point size.

questions.question: What plot displays all individual data points along with distribution?
questions.explanation: Swarm plots show every point without overlap for small datasets.

questions.question: What Matplotlib method creates a figure with multiple subplots?
questions.explanation: The subplots function creates a grid of axes for multiple charts.

questions.question: What visualization shows network relationships between nodes?
questions.explanation: Graphs visualize connections between entities as nodes and edges.

questions.question: What chart displays categories on both axes in a grid?
questions.explanation: Heatmaps show relationships between two categorical variables.
